job_history.work_description: Sheet metal mechanic Boeing 737 fuselage assembly line. Crew leader of a 3 man team, installing aft fuselage belly skins with minimal quality defects and under the required bar line, at a move rate of (2) units a day.

Performed audits on numerous functional test procedures to include: line clearance inspections, final inspections of component installation. Trained new Inspectors in procedures and aircraft systems. Tracked and maintained aircraft serialization logs. Assembly mechanic for V-22 final assembly.

Supervised 60 maintainers. Performed scheduled and unscheduled flight line maintenance of 16 Sikorsky MH-53E's. Full system QAR. Aircraft vibration analysis and rotor tracking systems certified. Performed work center audits on tool control, maintenance publications, FOD program and safety.
Performed scheduled maintenance. Introduced to aircraft systems and functions.

skills.name: Aircraft Assembly
skills.explanation: Extensive experience as an assembly mechanic on Boeing 737 fuselage assembly line and V-22 final assembly, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Supervised teams of up to 60 maintainers and led a 3-man team as a crew leader, indicating strong leadership skills.

skills.name: Quality Control
skills.explanation: Conducted audits on test procedures, performed line clearance inspections, and maintained quality control logs, showing strong proficiency in quality control.

skills.name: Aircraft Maintenance
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience in scheduled and unscheduled flight line maintenance, vibration analysis, and rotor tracking systems, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Managed teams of varying sizes, including training new inspectors and maintainers, showing strong proficiency in team management.

skills.name: Auditing
skills.explanation: Conducted work center audits on tool control, maintenance publications, FOD program, and safety, showing solid working proficiency in auditing.

skills.name: Mechanical Systems
skills.explanation: Extensive experience with aircraft systems and functions, including vibration analysis and rotor tracking systems, showing strong proficiency.
